title: (x) Design Museum - FF Schulbuch Sud {Franz}
content:
Hi   
   
Does anyone know what face this is?   
   
Thanks   
   
JIM   
===   
   
 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20071111143101im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/36291.gif)

 [‹ Looking for free beer...](http://web.archive.org/web/20071111143101/http:/www.typophile.com/node/4882 "Go to previous forum topic") [(x) Lacoste font - (similar to) TheSans {Eduardo} ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20071111143101/http:/www.typophile.com/node/4872 "Go to next forum topic")
author: union

comments.content: Could it be [FF Schulbuch](http://web.archive.org/web/20071111143101/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/fontfont/ff-schulbuch/) Süd / AG Schoolbook?

Is it? Looks pretty close to me:   
 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20071111143101im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/36311.gif)   
(Excuse the kerning ![:-)](http://web.archive.org/web/20071111143101im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/clipart/happy.gif) )   
   
The sample is not as thick, but I do think it started out as some variant of Schoolbook.
